sqlMap.select: select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.histo_indate = to_char(sysdate-1,'YYYYMMDD') group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50

select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.histo_indate >= #startday# and a.histo_indate <= #endday# group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50

select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d, genre_detail f where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and b.gen_detail_no = f.gen_detail_no and a.histo_indate = to_char(sysdate-1,'YYYYMMDD') and f.gen_no = #gen_no# group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50

select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.histo_indate like '%' || #year# || '%' and d.sing_nation = '한국' group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50

select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.histo_indate like '%' || #year# || '%' and d.sing_nation != '한국' group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50

select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, d.sing_name as name, b.mus_title as title, a.mem_id from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.mem_id=#mem_id# group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,d.sing_name,a.mem_id order by count(a.mus_no) desc

select count(a.mus_no) as count, a.histo_indate, b.mus_no, d.sing_name as name, b.mus_title as title, a.mem_id from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.mem_id=#mem_id# group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,d.sing_name,a.mem_id, a.histo_indate order by a.histo_indate desc

select count(a.mus_no) as histo_no, b.mus_no, d.sing_name as name, b.mus_title as title, a.mem_id, c.alb_image as image, max(a.histo_indate) as histo_indate from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.mem_id=#id# group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,d.sing_name,a.mem_id, c.alb_image order by histo_indate desc
